seo: Keycloak,SSRF漏洞,CVE-2020-10770,红帽公司,身份验证
summary: 该插件用于检测Keycloak应用中的request_uri SSRF漏洞（CVE-2020-10770），通过构造特定请求验证是否存在漏洞并返回相关信息。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the request_uri SSRF vulnerability (CVE-2020-10770) in Keycloak applications. It constructs specific requests to verify the existence of the vulnerability and returns related information.
